post.title: december 2nd - post black friday htib round-up
post.content: today's show: we did this a couple years ago, and it's probably just as good an idea now as it was then. being that many of you may have recently purchased your first hdtv at a great price on "black friday," we wanted to do a show that will help you decide on a home theater in a box (htib) system that will bring the other half of the hd experience into your hd theater. we list and briefly discuss 5 systems; all of which support blu-ray - some even include it. more... listen now - mp3
